pages.text: The Nitratic Igniter is a machine that uses various tnt to detonate items into new items. Drops can be increased using augments and better $(l:thermal:world/materials/catalysts)catalysts$(/l).$(br2)Nitratic Igniter recipes REQUIRE a catalyst.

pages.title: Augment Compatibility
pages.text: $(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/integral_components)Integral Components$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/item_filter)Item Filter$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/xp_storage)Knowledge Concentrator$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil)Expanded RF Coil$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil_storage)Stabilized RF Coil$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil_xfer)High-Flux RF Coil$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_speed)Flux Linkage Amplifier$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_efficiency)Flux Efficiency$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_output)Auxiliary Process Sieve$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_null)Auxiliary Cactus$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_catalyst)Catalytic Reclamation Chamber$(/l)
